# selectSpeed(_:)

**Instance Method**

Selects a specified playback speed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func selectSpeed(_ speed: AVPlaybackSpeed)
```

## Parameters

- **speed**: The playback speed to select.

## Discussion

If you call this method with a speed that isn’t contained in the [doc://com.apple.avkit/documentation/AVKit/AVPlayerViewController/speeds] property, the system ignores the call.

## Configuring playback speed

- **speeds**: A list of user-selectable playback speeds to show in the playback speed control.
- **selectedSpeed**: The currently selected playback speed.
- **AVPlaybackSpeed**: An object that represents a user-selectable playback speed in a playback user interface.
